definition: member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
a boneheaded teammate can do you more harm than the most formidable opponent (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 pa4 shen2 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 shou3 , jiu4 pa4 zhu1 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 you3
containing_words.word: 不怕神一樣的對手，就怕豬一樣的隊友

sentences.english: He thanked his teammates for getting him the basketball in the right spots.
sentences.chinese: 他感謝他的隊友把球傳到他接得最舒服的位置。

sentences.english: Predictably, teammates ply Wang with amusing phrases. On a recent flight, he greeted Larry Bowa.
sentences.chinese: 可以想見的是，隊友們也會教小王一些垃圾話。

sentences.english: Scherdel said the first flight was a familiarization flight for he and the team.
sentences.chinese: 謝爾德說這次首航對他和隊友們來說是輕車熟路。

sentences.english: In the bottom of the final inning, Shay's team scored again.
sentences.chinese: 第九局下半，小謝的隊友獲得積分。

sentences.english: The Reds midfielder is undecided whether he will follow team-mate Jamie Carragher by taking his coaching badges.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍隊長還未決定是否跟隨隊友卡拉格考取教練證書。

sentences.english: Raelert would later overtake his teammate during the run.
sentences.chinese: 而這一次的比賽中，拉爾特在跑步中超過了隊友甘伯。

sentences.english: The car was parked on the driveway of Toon team-mate Kevin Nolan's house at the time.
sentences.chinese: 卡羅爾的汽車當時正停在他隊友羅蘭的房子附近。

sentences.english: That's how I imagined my team-mates would be assessing me.
sentences.chinese: 我想我的隊友們也都是這麼評價我的。

sentences.english: He publicly feuded with former teammate Shaquille O'Neal.
sentences.chinese: 他與前隊友奧尼爾的長期不和衆所皆知。

sentences.english: The former Atletico Madrid keeper is wasting little time becoming integrated at United and adapting to his new surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 前馬競門將正在嘗試融入球隊，並與新隊友配合。

sentences.english: Good thing he had Andrew Bynum and a couple of keyed-up reserve guards as teammates.
sentences.chinese: 還好他有安豬以及一幫牛逼哄哄的後衛這些隊友。

sentences.english: One of my teammates is strong and tall.
sentences.chinese: 我的其中一個隊友又高又壯。

sentences.english: I realised that I'd let Holland and my team-mates down.
sentences.chinese: 我意識到，我讓荷蘭隊和我的隊友輸掉了比賽。

sentences.english: He faced teammate Chen Jin in the semi-finals and beat him handily in two sets.
sentences.chinese: 半決賽中，他直落兩盤，輕鬆擊敗隊友陳金。

sentences.english: He's fine and is training as normal with the team this morning.
sentences.chinese: 他情況很好並且和隊友們在早晨照常進行了訓練。

sentences.english: In training with Liverpool's Gary McAllister and Markus Babbel.
sentences.chinese: 與利物浦隊友麥卡利斯特和巴貝爾一同訓練。

definition: to be present/to be on the scene
to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
